text:
Adam Levine and Behati Prinsloo attend the 2015 Vanity Fair Oscar Party. Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Images

Behati Prinsloo gave fans the first glimpse at her and Adam Levine's new daughter in an adorable Father's Day post on Sunday.

The 29-year-old model shared a black-and-white photo of Levine, 39, holding baby Gio Grace on her Instagram and wrote a tribute to her husband of nearly four years.

"My first baby holding OUR second baby," she wrote in the post. "Our girls are so lucky to call you dad and I'm so lucky to have you as a husband a lover and a friend. We love you. Life is better with you."

She also included a note to her father.

"To my dad, thank you for being the best example to show me what I would want in a husband and father one day," she wrote. "The way you look at mom is the way Adam looks at me, thank you for being the best dad EVER."

The couple welcomed Gio in February but had only shared a photo of the baby's feet.

Their first daughter, Dusty Rose, was born in September 2016.

title: Adam Levine and Behati Prinsloo share the first adorable photo of their new baby daughter
